Pre-Game Insights: The Timberwolves have a 9-6 home game record and are 6-2 in games decided by less than 4 points. The Celtics are 11-3 on the road and 9-4 against opponents with a winning record. The Timberwolves average 14.9 made 3-pointers per game, which is 2.3 more than the 12.6 per game the Celtics allow. The Celtics average 119.6 points per game compared to the Timberwolves' 107.4 points allowed.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards is shooting 44.3% and averaging 24.8 points for the Timberwolves. Jayson Tatum is scoring 28.3 points per game with 9.5 rebounds and 5.5 assists for the Celtics. The Timberwolves and Celtics have injury concerns with Rob Dillingham, Luka Garza, and Kristaps Porzingis listed as day-to-day with ankle issues.
